name: Hole in danger!
description:
HOLE IN DANGER! is a game that consists of a black hole absorbing as much as it can before *X* amount of time passes, it absorbs everything except a poisonous liquid for this hole, it will subtract time to absorb. And don't forget to get the highest score possible! ;)

MOVEMENT:

*w* to go up

*s* to down

SKILLS:

*shield* will protect you from anything for 1 second (regenerates every 30 seconds) click on it to use it

EASTER EGG:

Konami code???
